title: The Masked Singer: Dr Drew Pinsky removes his Eagle mask after stumping celebrity panel on Fox show
text:
Dr. Drew Pinsky after stumping the celebrity panel removed his Eagle mask on Wednesday's episode of The Masked Singer on Fox.

The 61-year-old celebrity doctor and addiction specialist revealed his identity after losing to Flower and then Penguin.

The one-hour episode featured four costumed singers competing against each other as part of Group D.

Singer unmasked: Dr. Drew Pinsky after stumping the celebrity panel removed his Eagle mask on Wednesday's episode of The Masked Singer on Fox

Eagle was paired against Flower in the first match-up, followed by Penguin versus Fox.

The bird of prey sang the Meat Loaf song I'd Do Anything For Love (But I Won't Do That) while Flower belted out 9 To 5 by Dolly Parton.

The clues for Eagle included a recent health scare and the loss of a parent.

'I don't just hang out with rock stars, I am one,' Eagle said during his clues package.

Power ballad: The bird of prey sang the Meat Loaf song I'd Do Anything For Love (But I Won't Do That) in the first match-up against Flower

Clues package: Eagle in the clues package revealed a recent health scare and the loss of a parent

First pairing: Flower and Eagle faced off first as part of Group D

The studio audience and panelists Robin Thicke, Jenny McCarthy, Ken Jeong and Nicole Scherzinger declared Flower the winner.

Eagle after losing to Flower was forced to compete in a Smackdown with Penguin who earlier lost to Fox during their pairing.

The Smackdown started with Eagle performing the Nancy Sinatra song These Boots Are Made for Walkin' followed by Penguin singing Worth It by Fifth Harmony.

Flower power: Flower impressed with her rendition of 9 To 5 by Dolly Parton while competing against Eagle

Smackdown battle: Eagle and Penguin faced off in a Smackdown after losing their first face-offs

Penguin went beak-to-beak with Eagle while singing and also twerked and did a karate kick.

'My goodness! Worth it and working it,' said host Nick Cannon, 39, of Penguin after the Smackdown.

The panelists declared Penguin the winner and the judges made their final guesses about Eagle's identity.

Working it: Penguin during the Smackdown went beak-to-beak with Eagle and also twerked and did a karate kick

The host: Nick Cannon hosted the one-hour episode on Fox

Jenny, 46, thought it could be Adam Carolla, while Robin, 42, went with Howard Stern.

Ken, 50, guessed it was Craig Ferguson, as Nicole believed it was Jeff Foxworthy.

Dr Drew, who hosted the radio talk show Loveline from 1984 until its end in 2016, then took off his Eagle mask proving them all wrong.

The panelists: Robin Thicke, Jenny McCarthy, Ken Jeong and Nicole Scherzinger were stumped by Eagle as none of them correctly guessed his identity

Listening hard: Jenny listened hard to try to recognize voices

'I did not see this coming at all,' Ken said.

Dr Drew called the singing experience 'very bizarre' and noted that Jenny was close with her guess of Adam, who hosted Loveline with him.

Flower earlier wowed the panelists and audience with her rendition of 9 To 5.

Celebrity doctor: Dr Drew removed his Eagle mask after losing the Smackdown to Penguin

Fox also impressed with his version of This Love by Maroon 5 as he beat Penguin who sang The Middle by Zedd, Maren Morris and Grey.

Season two of The Masked Singer premiered on September 25 on Fox.

Figure skater Johnny Weir, 35, and pro gamer Ninja, 28, were eliminated during the two-hour premiere and Laila Ali, 41, was sent home last week.

The Masked Singer will return next week on Fox.
description: The 61-year-old celebrity doctor after stumping the celebrity panel removed his Eagle mask on Wednesday's episode of The Masked Singer on Fox.
